Authors:
Alexandre Gonçalves dos Santos Silva-Filho, Mariana Sá,
Felipe Wartchow, Dirce Leimi Komura
Title:
Two novel species of Lactifluus subg. Pseudogymnocarpi
(Russulales) from Brazil
Keywords:
Agaricomycetes, milkcaps, Neotropic, new taxa, phylogeny,
rDNA ITS, Russulaceae
Abstract:
Two new Lactifluus, Lf. umbilicatus and Lf. venosellus
were collected from Amazonian and Atlantic Forest of Brazil,
respectively. These two taxa, belongs to subg. Pseudogymnocarpi and were
described based on detailed macro- and micromorphological observations
along with nrITS-based phylogenetic analysis. In addition to the
detailed description, are provided illustrations, scanning electron
microscopy of the basidiospores and comparisons with related taxa.
